Posts.Content: ESP82 wrote: my husband and I were together last night. He went to massage my breast but this awful pain shot through my breast. So i sat up and did an exam. There was a knot and every time i came back to it this awful pain came too. Also theres pain in the sides of my breasts as well, underneath my arms. Im so scared but i dont want to jump the gun. Any advice?? Answers?? Log in to post a reply
